channel.title: Web on Tomorrow is 42
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Tomorrow is 42

item.title: Getting there... static site
item.author: Email Contact (lxip)
item.description: I have been thinking for a while putting up a blog recording random stuff. It might be a better way to keep track what I’ve been looking at and regularize some massy notes. After wasting a summer leaving the plain template lying in my disk folder, it’s good to start now since the season is getting closer to my background picture. With the free domain provided by Github, there has been a good amount of choices for set up a static website/blog.
